description:
A campaign set in a homebrew world I've been working on for a couple of years with various campaigns. Currently, the PC's are investigating ruins of an ancient city that appeared on an island in the middle of an inland sea.
Has to be done via Discord because 2 of the current players live in the US, the starting time is currently flexible
location: Discord for voice, Foundry VTT for the game itself
name: D&D 3.5
